flawed_nl_solution:
Curtis had the Salisbury steak for $16 and Rob had the Chicken Fried Steak at $18 so their meal cost 16+18 = $<<16+18=34>>34
They ate 3 pm so their meal is half off so their meal cost 34/2 = $71
#### 71

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 17, not 71. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
